name: On the Edge (MaierDan)
description:
This is my second unity project.

Tested on Linux and it works great!

Issues:

  • WebGL build has some issues with the sound (unity doesn`t see sound files while building for WebGL platform, idk why :( )

Modifications:

  • Reskined the existing graphics.
  • Replaced all sound effects in the game.
  • Added  power ups (health, fire rate and shield power ups).
  • Created a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent levels.
